markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Musetouched](/Feats.aspx?ID=1353) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your blood sings with the liberating power of the [azatas](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=10), living embodiments of freedom from the wild realm of [Elysium](/Planes.aspx?ID=16). You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79). When you roll a critical failure on a check to Escape, you get a failure instead, and when you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

<title level="2">Musetouched leads to...</title>
[Azata Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1359), [Call of Elysium](/Feats.aspx?ID=2290)
name: Musetouched
